specials.name: Spring Upon Prey
specials.description: Trigger A creature touches the web lurker’s web while the web lurker is on it OR moves within melee striking range while the creature is feigning death. Requirement Initiative has not yet been rolled. Effect The web lurker automatically notices the creature (on web) and Strides or Climbs before rolling initiative (feign death) stands without provoking reactions and makes a melee strike.

specials.name: Web Trap
specials.description: A creature hit by the web lurker’s web attack is immobilized and stuck to the nearest surface until it succeeds at DC 20 Acrobatics check to Escape.

specials.name: Protection: Good
specials.description: The Nghtmare web lurker is under the constant effects of protection:good gaining a +1 to ac and savings throws from creatures of that allignment and a +3 to saves against effects that would exert control over the creature.

specials.name: Look of Fear
specials.description:
30 feet:  When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a DC 18 Will save. 
Success No Effect
Failure Frightened 1 for 1 round
Critical Failure Frightened 1, Stunned 1 for 1 minute
The nightmare web lurker can deactivate or activate this aura by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

specials.name: Feign Death
specials.description: At any time, including in reaction to an attack, this creature gives the impression that it deceased to draw in potential victims.  A DC 20 Perception check is required to identify this ruse.

perception.note: darkvision, tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet (creatures touching its web)
